about_the_game:
You've immersed yourself in the vibrant world of Max Mustard, now go behind the scenes with our Digital Artbook! Treat yourself to never-before-seen concept art, character backstories and insights into the world and environment of Sky Ring.

This artbook features select pieces of concept art inspired by classic 3D platformers, with creations of our talented art team that made it into the game (and a whole heap more that we couldn't include!). Grab the Max Mustard Digital Artbook now and be transported into the immersive VR world of Max Mustard!
